title: USCIS Medical Exam FAQ
description: USCIS medical exam FAQs without rankings or endorsements.
main_html:
If you only read one thing:

Before booking, verify civil surgeon authorization, confirm required documents, and get costs and timelines in writing.

FAQ

USCIS medical exam FAQs

Neutral answers to common questions. No rankings. Educational only; not legal or medical advice.

%%AD:global_faq_mid%%
%%FAQ_ITEMS_GLOBAL%%

Pre-Booking Decision Framework: Quick checklist before you book

  • Verify civil surgeon authorization using official sources.
  • Get it in writing: included services, itemized costs, and timelines.
  • Bring records. Confirm which vaccination documents are accepted.
%%AD:global_faq_bottom%%

Why this matters: correct authorization and complete records reduce delays and rescheduling.
